question: After being involved in an accident, you were looked after by a person you did not know before. Write a special thank you letter to express your gratitude.In your letter:Introduce yourself and let him/her know why you are writingExpress your appreciationAnd offer him/ her to visit your home with this family
text: This letter is to express my appreciation for your kindness and helpful aid about the accident that happened last month.

My name is Hiroki Imano. I was involved in a car accident. At that time I was unconscious and impossible to recognize what was happening, and therefore I could not tell you my gratitude in person. Even if you might not know me, your bravery rushed and applied me first aid. Moreover, I could get well enough to walk now.
I would like to express the biggest thank you and hope for you and your family's health. My doctor also told me that unless your help, it would take much longer to get well.
As it is not enough for me to thank you just by writing this letter, I would like to meet you in person to express my feeling. If possible I would like to require your home address and phone number.
